text: Famous fashion favourites stepped out in an array of outfits this week, and we're here to break it all down for you. The ladies of ` ` The Hunger Games : Mockingjay - Part 2'' kept their red carpet style streak going strong, with Natalie Dormer topping our list with her whimsical Vivienne Westwood gown. Jennifer Lawrence came a close section, looking dark and moody in Schiaparelli Couture, while Julianne Moore's dark red tresses looked beautiful against an emerald green Chanel couture gown. And we have to give special mention to Jada Pinkett Smith, who went braless in a sheer, shimmering gown, which we consider the prettiest naked dress ever. Check out this week's best dressed list below, and let us know
